name: Stickman Destruction Pogo
description:
" Stickman Destruction Pogo " - Addictive game with reality ragdoll physics. Use all the laws of physics ( Also your imagination ) to get as high-score as possible! You have a many of different poses, different moves such as sliding, lying or doing pogo... to make a interesting destruction story ! There are many vehicles that you can use to make a interesting destruction story !
Features:
- Unique active ragdoll physics system
- Addictive gameplay, Easy to begin, hard to master 
- Multiple maps with different obstacles 
- Multiple vehicles for your imagination
- Amazing tricks and destruction
- Global top score
- Enjoy free and unlimited coins
Perform incredible dizzying tricks, break against walls, break bones,flying in the air,destroy chests, boxes with explosives and have fun!
Do not attempt game actions in real life.
